channel.title: ZenithScape checking for updates 1%?
channel.description: whenever i try my friends rsps downloadable client it gets stuck on checking for updates 1% then i try his server on rswebclient.com and it says unable to connect to server please try a different world. This happens to my friend also any help?

item.title: ZenithScape checking for updates 1%?
item.dc:creator: @ggallin ggallin
item.description:
@ggallin wrote:

[quote=“MacaYork, post:11, topic:454248”][quote author=RuneEden link=topic=557115.msg4077853#msg4077853 date=1345043348]

cheers everyone we got it to work in the end. He changed the ip.

Yet he got mad saying that wasn’t the problem.
[/quote]

wasnt me that was getting mad[/quote]
whatever you do, don’t make me mad. i’ll go GGALLIN CRAZY. Glad you solved the problem, perhaps a moderator should sticky a thread with these solutions due to the high amount of the same questions resulting in the same feedback.

Edited:
my bad, already found stickied page.

Read full topic

item.title: ZenithScape checking for updates 1%?
item.dc:creator: @ggallin ggallin
item.description:
@ggallin wrote:

it may have to do with the cache downloading to the computer, if your bandwidth is low you may have trouble downloading the cache. or you misplaced the cache.

Read full topic

don’t get all mad at us and getting butt hurt if it doesnt work obviously u did something wrong, go to canyouseeme.org and see if his ports are open.

item.title: ZenithScape checking for updates 1%?
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

The clients aren’t compatible. People set ids in the server and client to make it so you can only use the one client to connect to the one source. And yes, you are doing something wrong or it would be working for you, wouldn’t it?

Read full topic

item.title: ZenithScape checking for updates 1%?
item.dc:creator: @V_1_N_C_H V 1 N C H
item.description:
@V_1_N_C_H wrote:

Stop trying to tell us that we did something wrong. It’s a problem with the client itself.

If you want proof of this, It won’t work for me, and I run a server ON THE SAME PORT But when I change it to run the ZenithScape source, It will not let other people connect, though it does for ANY other source on the SAME port.

Read full topic

item.title: ZenithScape checking for updates 1%?
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

dont use loaders make your own jar make sure that you change the ip for them make a 64 bit and 32 bit

make sure your friend has the newest java update jre7 and make sure your server is turned on and your portforwarded it will work then

Read full topic

item.title: ZenithScape checking for updates 1%?
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

This could be several things.

  1. Your friend did not change the IP the client connects to to his.
  2. He did not compile the client correctly after changing the IP.
  3. He is not portforwarded correctly.
  4. Something is blocking the connection, such as a firewall.

Read full topic
